quagga.input.subject: Vacation, floating holiday request
quagga.input.body:
Reference for future months.  
---------------------- Forwarded by Sally Beck/HOU/ECT on 01/05/2000 01:16 PM 
---------------------------
   
	
	
	From:  Sheila Glover                           01/05/2000 09:26 AM
	

To: Sally Beck/HOU/ECT@ECT, Gary Hickerson/HOU/ECT@ECT
cc: Theresa T Brogan/HOU/ECT@ECT, Bennett Kaufman/HOU/ECT@ECT, Laurel 
Adams/HOU/ECT@ECT, Gretel Smith/HOU/ECT@ECT, Kelly 
Templeton/Corp/Enron@ENRON, Stella L Ely/HOU/ECT@ECT 
Subject: Vacation, floating holiday request

Sally, Gary,

I would like the following vacation time off:
Monday, Jan 10th (changed from Jan 11th)
February 21-25
March 15 - 17

Thanks. Sheila
